name: KIPIDON (Very Early Test Build)
description:
Venus, the solar system's God of Love,  realises that Valentine's Day is coming up and he has not met his yearly quota of love. This makes him call upon two kids, Bèl & Chime, to get as much love in the air as possible using the Kipidon Flower as a weapon.

This build is mostly just to see how people enjoy the base gameplay, as well as testing performance on other devices.

CREDITS

Music for Level 2 Part 2, OPEN LETTER (feat. Teezo Touchdown) - MIA GLADSTONE [currently placeholder]

Everything else: ClascyJitto (J.C.)
